verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3972>he<s%> <S%G5563>departed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G116>Athens<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%>, a man of <S%G4193>Pontus<s%> by <S%G1085>race<s%>, <S%G4373>lately<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2482>Italy<s%>, <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%>, <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> had <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> to <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%>: and he <S%G4334>came<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> he <S%G1511>was<s%> of the same <S%G3673>trade<s%>, he <S%G3306>abode<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2038>wrought<s%>, <S%G1063>for<s%> by their <S%G5078>trade<s%> they were <S%G4635>tentmakers<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the synagogue4864, 2596 <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when5613, Deuteronomy37 <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2718>came<s%> down <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G4912>constrained<s%> by the <S%G4151>word<s%>, <S%G1263>testifying<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G498>opposed<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%>, he <S%G1621>shook<s%> out his <S%G2440>raiment<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> be <S%G1909>upon<s%> your <S%G5216>own<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%>; <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>clean<s%>: <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3568>henceforth<s%> I will <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G3686>named<s%> Titus <S%G2459>Justus<s%>, one <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G4576>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>whose<s%> house3614, 2258 joined <S%G4927>hard<s%> to the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2921>Crispus<s%>, the ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%>, <S%G4100>believed<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2881>Corinthians<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> a <S%G3705>vision<s%>, <S%G5399>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4623>hold<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> thy <S%G4623>peace<s%>:

for <S%G1360><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> shall <S%G2007>set<s%> on <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G2559>harm<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>: <S%G1360>for<s%> <S%G3427>I<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> he <S%G2523>dwelt<s%> there a <S%G1763>year<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>, <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> was <S%G445>proconsul<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G2721>rose<s%> up against <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment-seat<s%>,
saying <S%G3754><s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G374>persuadeth<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> contrary <S%G3844>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3303>If<s%> indeed it <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3767>a<s%> <S%G5100>matter<s%> <S%G5599>of<s%> <S%G92>wrong<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G5599>villany<s%>, O ye <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3056>reason<s%> would <S%G2596>that<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> should <S%G430>bear<s%> with <S%G5216>you<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> and2532, 2596 <S%G5209>your<s%> own <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3700>look<s%> to it <S%G846>yourselves<s%>; <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1014>minded<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> a <S%G2923>judge<s%> of these <S%G5130>matters<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G556>drove<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G968>judgment-seat<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1672>they<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> laid <S%G1949>hold<s%> on <S%G4988>Sosthenes<s%>, the ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G5180>beat<s%> him <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment-seat<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> cared <S%G3199>for<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G5130>things<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, having <S%G4357>tarried<s%> after this <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, took his <S%G657>leave<s%> of the <S%G80>brethren<s%>, and sailed <S%G1602>thence<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4947>Syria<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%>: having <S%G2751>shorn<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchreae<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G2171>vow<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, <S%G2548>and<s%> he left <S%G2641>them<s%> <S%G847>there<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1525>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>.
And <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> him <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> a longer4119, 3844, 846 <S%G5550>time<s%>, he <S%G1962>consented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G657>taking<s%> his <S%G657>leave<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G2036>saying<s%>, I will <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2309>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%>, <S%G2532>he<s%> set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G2718>landed<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%>, he went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G782>saluted<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>, and went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> having <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1831>there<s%>, he departed, and went <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G1054>Galatia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5435>Phrygia<s%>, in <S%G2517>order<s%>, <S%G1991>establishing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%>, an <S%G221>Alexandrian<s%> by <S%G1085>race<s%>, an <S%G3052>eloquent<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>; <S%G5607>and<s%> he was <S%G1415>mighty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>.

This <S%G3778>man<s%> had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G2727>instructed<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, he <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G199>accurately<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2962>Jesus<s%>, <S%G1987>knowing<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%>:

and <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to speak <S%G3955>boldly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1161>synagogue<s%>. But <S%G191>when<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G4355>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4355>unto<s%> <S%G2532>them<s%>, and <S%G1620>expounded<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> more <S%G199>accurately<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1014>minded<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> over <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G4389>encouraged<s%> <S%G1125>him<s%>, and wrote to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G588>receive<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G3739>and<s%> when he was <S%G3854>come<s%>, he helped <S%G4820>them<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> had <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2159>powerfully<s%> <S%G1246>confuted<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, and that <S%G1219>publicly<s%>, <S%G1925>showing<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> <S%G1925>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
